template <typename T>
class vsip::impl::User_storage
File: ../../../vsip/core/user_storage.hpp

Class to hold storage that has been given to us by the user. For complex data, this can be in three different formats (array of complex, array of interleaved real, or arrays of split real). The block value type does not determine/restrict which type of data the block can be constructed with.

General case intended for non-complex types.

Specializations:
